positive_examples: This is an example of drone.
We observed drone in this context.
A typical case of drone would involve these features.
The concept of drone applies here.
An unmanned aircraft that is piloted remotely or flies autonomously through software-controlled flight plans.
negative_examples: This is an example of helicopter, not drone.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Helicopter, or other types of Aircraft

definition: An unmanned aircraft operated remotely or autonomously.
